title: Will there be an icon for the 2018 college champion?
body: I need to rep my boys (UCI) when they win :0)

replies.body: Unfortunately, we don't have any current plans to create a College Championship Icon. We try and ensure that content we add to the game is globally relevant, which can be difficult when the College Championship is just for North America. We know that past, present, and future students want to be able to represent their school and we want to figure out the best way to support that.

> [{quoted}](name=Sherman,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=AvkU5iaB,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-06-13T19:25:12.083+0000)
>
> Unfortunately, we don't have any current plans to create a College Championship Icon. We try and ensure that content we add to the game is globally relevant, which can be difficult when the College Championship is just for North America. We know that past, present, and future students want to be able to represent their school and we want to figure out the best way to support that.

Out of curiosity, what about region-specific profile flair? I could easily see something like this becoming a cheap (or free) bit of flair you could add to your profile in place of, say, your favorite champion background or something. It's something I could see possibly adding to a small search interface in the client (click a profile option, get presented with a list of champion/League art to select from, and a place to type in a name of a champion/team to narrow it down further), and letting regional teams from events like the College Championships etc. actually create their own backgrounds (within a set of Riot guidelines) and get approval for, so that their fans could then find them in the client.
